actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that any person receiving a questionnaire from a Member of Congress may return such questionnaire under the frank.

summary.text: Permits any frankable Congressional questionnaire to be returned as franked mail to the Member of Congress mailing such questionnaire.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to provide that any person receiving a questionnaire from a Member of Congress may return such questionnaire under the frank.
